name: Richa
memory: Richa is my friend. She is a hardware developer.

name: Dev
memory: Dev is my friend from college. We met during our freshman year and have stayed in touch ever since.

name: Bob
memory: Bob is a colleague from my previous job. We worked together on several projects and shared many great moments.

name: Carol
memory: Carol is my cousin. We grew up together and spent many holidays and vacations as a family.

name: David
memory: David is my neighbor. We often have friendly chats and help each other with various tasks around the neighborhood.
